lead_paragraph: From its caviar-filled eggs to its chocolate cake with sesame ganache, the upscale Chinese restaurant in the Waldorf Astoria offers sophisticated surprises.
snippet: From its caviar-filled eggs to its chocolate cake with sesame ganache, the upscale Chinese restaurant in the Waldorf Astoria offers sophisticated surprises.

headline.main: Imagination Worth the Added Price at Midtown’s La Chine
headline.print_headline: An Investment in Imaginative Chinese Cooking

abstract: Pete Wells reviews restaurant La Chine in Manhattan's Waldorf Astoria hotel.
